name: MechaCharge
description:
Description

Control your robot and defend the humanity from the alien invasion but, be careful because you have to control the energy and change between the shooting and energy drainer shoot in order to have ammo.

Controls

Use the ARROW KEYS to move the orange BOT

Z for SHOOTING

X for CHARGE ENERGY by hitting the enemies.

Credits

Programming
Alejandro Jesús Sánchez

Art 

  • Salvador "Deewa" Sánchez 
  •  Mayte Barranco

Design
